api_list.name: Get Comments from search term
api_list.description: Retrieve comments based on a search term or an URL.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://trendyol-data.p.rapidapi.com/getComments"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendyol-data.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://trendyol-data.p.rapidapi.com/getComments"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "trendyol-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
